## MapboxMapProps.PinComponent property

Custom Pin component to render for markers on the map. By default, the built-in marker image from Mapbox GL is used. This prop should not be used with [renderPin](./anguyen-search-ui-react-test.mapboxmapprops.renderpin.md)<!-- -->. If both are provided, only PinComponent will be used.

**Signature:**

```typescript
PinComponent?: PinComponent<T>;
```
